model

Class TransferDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.TransferDAO

  • public class TransferDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    Data access object class for Transfers. Used in accessing the table in the database.

      • readSeletedTransfers

        public Transfer[] readSeletedTransfers(java.sql.Date dateStart,
                                       java.sql.Date dateEnd)
        Method for reading selected Transfers in the database, transfers are filtered by the dates
        Parameters:
        dateStart - - the earliest date of the transfers
        dateEnd - - the latest date of the transfers
        Returns:
        Transfer[] array with all the transfers in the database
